talk.words: You look better like that. How about it? Feel like telling us the location of the Device now?
The men encircle Adele, and she's raped by one after another.
I don't—know anything—about that... Even if I did, I'd never tell you!
Stubborn woman... Oi, fuck her harder!
One man pierces her from the front while another takes her from behind, ramming in and out of her in tandem.
Ggghnnn! Aaaaaahhh! Hnnngggh! Gaaaaauhhhh!
Ghhhaaaghh! No matter—what you do to me—hnngh! I won't talk! Give up— gaaaaaahhh!
We'll be the ones to decide that. If you won't tell us where the Device is, then just shut up!
(This is nothing. I just need to put up with this humiliation until they sate themselves and wander off.)
(But...will he really come? The Successor who will save this world...)
Oi! Who said you could have a break!
(I must have faith... I will fulfill my duties...)
Still not talking, huh? All you have to do is tell us where the Device is, and we'll stop!
That belongs to the Church... I will never let you get your hands on it!
Why do you cling to the Church that much? They're only using you in their own way, you know!
Hnngh! Aaaah! Th-that is not true!
Dog of the Church. If you won't talk, then we'll just have to put that body of your's to use.
Aaaauuuunnnhhh! Aaaaahhh! Hnnghh! Ggaaaauuuuhhh!
Their endless ravaging ends up causing climax upon Adele's body.
Hnnghhh! Aaauuuuhhhhh! Aaaahh—hnnnnghhh!
Even as Adele climaxes, the men make no move to pull their cocks out of her.
Hahaha! We aren't even close to being done with you yet!
The men ejaculate in her vagina and anus countless times.
Aaahhh! Ngghhhhh!
The men took turns fucking Adele all night long, leaving her body ragged and exhausted.
